FOUND IN: Sociable - Enjoying the company of others; gregarious.

Bigotry manifests itself through various forms of social exclusion, verbal insults, hate speech, stereotyping, systemic bias, denial of opportunities, or even physical violence towards those who are perceived as different from the dominant group within a society.
